S

Sentence - Class in com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure
NLP Data Structure - Sentence Sentence data structure is created by Paragraph and responsible for splitting input string into SentenceItem(s) items and storing them into array list by using non-word regular expression: "\W" SentenceItem are subclassed into Word(s) and Punctuation(s) This class also implements XMLTagable interface for XML output
Sentence() - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.Sentence
Default constructor
SentenceItem - Class in com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure
Abstract class for sentence items which extend this class and include: Word(s) and Punctuation(s) These items are stored in an array list in the Sentence class
SentenceItem() - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.SentenceItem
 
SentenceTest - Class in com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.test
 
SentenceTest() - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.test.SentenceTest
 
setPunctuation(String) - Method in class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.Punctuation
Set punctuation to a String
setWord(String) - Method in class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.Word
 
StringToObjectStrategy - Class in com.dr.nlp.sl.executor.strategy
converts String into com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.* Objects starting with TextFile to Paragarph(s) to Sentence(s) to SentenceItem(s) such as Word(s) and Punctuation(s)
StringToObjectStrategy(Config, String) - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.executor.strategy.StringToObjectStrategy
Constructor
StringToObjectStrategyTest - Class in com.dr.nlp.sl.executor.strategy.test
 
StringToObjectStrategyTest() - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.executor.strategy.test.StringToObjectStrategyTest
